snippet: The revocation means the United States will have to decide whether to extradite the cleric, Fethullah Gulen, a foe of the Turkish president.
abstract: Turkey tells United States it has revoked passport of Pennsylvania-based cleric Fethullah Gulen, enemy of Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan; Gulen's lawyers claim passport is still valid.
lead_paragraph: The revocation means the United States will have to decide whether to extradite the cleric, Fethullah Gulen, a foe of the Turkish president.

headline.main: Turkey Revokes Passport of Cleric in Exile in Pennsylvania
